Html:
Hello Friends,

 

I need some help i went through the license and rest of the forum but i was confused, i am developing an application and i would like to use this Windows Ribbon in my application, But the problem is that i am selling my application commercially and this is my first requirement so i am still looking around for the free controls that even those specifically commercial free so please assist me and guide me if i can adapt Windows Ribbon to my application?

 

Do i need to contact the developer? or further need any permissions?

 

Thanks
I have the same question as yours, got any answers so far ?

You are allowed to use the Ribbon in commercial, free and open source applications.

Please be aware of the copyright things. To be save here do the following. In your software descriptions (on your webpage, in your distribution package...) add a statement that you are using this ribbon control with a link to the project here.

For open source projects you can find a good description here...
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/633132/is-ms-pl-microsoft-public-license-code-allowed-in-commercial-product
